body.name: Certified Refurbished Ring Alarm 8-piece kit (2nd Gen) – home security system with optional 24/7 professional monitoring – Works with Alexa
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 46 mins
features: A Certified Refurbished Ring Alarm 8-piece kit is refurbished, tested, and certified to look and work like new and comes with the same limited warranty as a new device. Certified Refurbished Amazon devices may be packaged in generic Amazon-branded boxes.
A great fit for 1-2 bedroom homes, this kit includes one base station, one keypad, four contact sensors, one motion detector, and one range extender.
Put whole-home security at your fingertips with Ring Alarm, a do-it-yourself alarm system.
Includes a more intuitive keypad with emergency buttons and smaller contact sensors to seamlessly blend into your home.
Receive mobile notifications when your system is triggered, change your Alarm modes, and monitor all your Ring devices all through the Ring app.
Choose the Ring Alarm kit that fits your needs and add additional components and accessories at any time.
Easily setup your Ring Alarm by plugging in your base station, connecting to wifi via the Ring app, and placing your sensors in their ideal locations.

Better with Alexa: Arm and disarm Ring Alarm with your voice and get mobile alerts about the sound of broken glass or smoke alarms with Alexa Guard. Call trained agents from your Echo who can request the dispatch of emergency responders with Alexa Guard Plus, included with an eligible Ring Protect plan.

productInformation.name: Video history for up to 180 days
Camera Home and Away Modes(Ring doorbells and home cameras)*
Create home security automations with Alarm*
10% off Select Products at Ring.com and Amazon.com
Download up to 50 videos at once
24/7 Backup Internet with Extra Data with your Ring Alarm Pro device
Digital Security with eero Secure with your Ring Alarm Pro device
Ring Edge with Local Video Storage with your Ring Alarm Pro device
Save up to $100 per year on your Home Insurance⁹
Installation
productInformation.value: Plugs into standard power outlets, Ring Alarm Kit required

productInformation.name: Connectivity
productInformation.value: Z-Wave (250-foot range to Base Station, extends Z-Wave a further 250 feet)

productInformation.name: Warranty and service
productInformation.value: Ring Alarm Kit includes 1-year limited warranty and service. This device receives the same limited warranty as a new device. Learn more about Certified Refurbished Amazon devices. Use of Ring Alarm Kit is subject to terms and conditions.

productInformation.name: Support
productInformation.value: Click here to view more information on the Ring Alarm Kit support page. For monitoring licenses, visit ring.com/licenses.

productInformation.name: Software Security Updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about these software security updates. If you already own a Ring device, visit Software Security Updates in Ring Control Center for information specific to your device.

productInformation.name: Disclaimers
productInformation.value: 1 Ring Alarm and all Ring Alarm accessories require a subscription for in-app features and digital notifications, including but not limited to: digital arming / disarming and integration with other Ring, Echo, Alexa, and third party products. Subscription sold separately. View Ring Protect Plans for pricing and details. Customer reviews may reference features that require a subscription. 2 Ring Alarm Professional Monitoring service is available only within the U.S. (all 50 states, but not U.S. territories), and is included with a Ring Protect Pro Plan (subscription required, sold separately). Additional charges may apply in areas that require permits or guard response service for alarm verification. Enrollment required. 3 Extra data charges may apply. Cellular data is provided by a third party carrier. Coverage, uptime, technology, and speeds will vary. May require backup power if the power goes out. Visit here for more details. Ring Alarm Pro is designed to be used as your primary router. It must be directly connected to your modem as the internet gateway. Don’t set up Ring Alarm Pro on an existing wifi network. 4 A compatible Ring Protect subscription required, sold separately. Alarm Cellular Backup uses a third-party carrier. Coverage will vary. 5 Advanced online security features are available to US customers with eero Secure, which is included with a Ring Protect Pro subscription. 6 Battery life is dependent on device settings, usage, and other factors. Internal battery backup lasts up to 24 hours in Low Power Mode. In Low Power Mode, only some security features, including Alarm Cellular Backup, are available. Battery life is dependent on device settings, usage, environment, and other factors. 7 Ring Alarm Pro and a Ring Protect subscription are required to use Ring Edge features. Additionally, a microSD card is required to use Local Video Storage. All sold separately. For more information, visit here. Ring Edge is currently not available for Ring Video Doorbell 4, Floodlight Cam Wired Pro, Always Home Cam, Ring Video Doorbell (1st Gen), or Stick Up Cam (1st Gen). Ring Edge live view and stored videos will be initially available only in the Ring app and not on Ring.com. 9 Actual savings vary depending on insurance carrier and policy. 10 Smoke and carbon monoxide monitoring is not available for a business or commercially zoned address.

productInformation.name: Max distance between sensors
productInformation.value: 1 inch. Leave ½” space on non-magnet side to access battery compartment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ring alarm system on a budget!
reviews.reviewText: The Ring alarm system was easy to setup and use. All the included parts worked well and buying refurbished was well worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup and effective comforting solution
reviews.reviewText: This was so simple to setup - the hardest part is probably going though the boxes within boxes while unpacking it which is also a bit entertaining.Works perfectly, provides a great sense of security, the ring app makes it simple to operate. And it’s all very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished was just like new!
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try the refurbished Ring kit to save some money and I'm glad I did as everything came in the original boxes as if they were brand new. The system is easy to set up (I've had Ring doorbells and another self installed system before which made it even easier) and the price is really good for 24/7 professional monitoring. I've had no issues with the alarm system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I don't usually buy refurbished but glad I did with this alarm system. Saved money and works great. It was easy to set up, as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars not bad for Refurbished
reviews.reviewText: "I was pleasantly surprised by the performance of the Certified Refurbished Ring Alarm 8-piece kit (2nd Gen) home security system. Despite being refurbished, it functions flawlessly and provides reliable protection for my home. The setup process was straightforward, and the optional 24/7 professional monitoring adds an extra layer of security and peace of mind.The only drawback I encountered was the requirement to register the alarm with my county police and fire departments for them to respond to alerts. While this process was a bit inconvenient, it's a necessary step for ensuring the effectiveness of emergency response services. that's also additional cost every month on top of the additional fees for the subscription for the ring systemOverall, I'm highly impressed with the Ring Alarm system and would recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable home security solution."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly! Loved saving extra money! Looks just like new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good As New
reviews.reviewText: From what I can see, this refurbished set is as good as new. Had the previous model in my old house, and decided to upgrade on my new house. This model is even easier to install than the old one, which was also pretty easy. You can't go wrong with Ring hardware or service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am not accustomed to purchasing refurbished items and I decided to try it with Ring Kit.I installed it without any issues and works just as good as new.
